animation="none"][trx_column_item][trx_icon icon="icon-pan" color="#d3dbde" size="52"][trx_title link="#" type="4" color="#00abd3" animation="none" top="18"]Maintenance[/trx_title][trx_block]Drain cleaning, drain care, septic system care, septic field rejuvenation, tank inspection, high-tech sewer jetting, pipe sanitizing...[/trx_block][trx_button style="dark" size="medium" icon="none" link="?page_id=2148" animation="none" top="15" bottom="25" left="0" right="0"]get quote![/trx_button][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_icon icon="icon-water-tap" color="#d3dbde" size="52"][trx_title link="#" type="4" color="#00abd3" animation="none" top="18"]New Installation[/trx_title][trx_block]Leaks repair, faucet installation, toilet repair, toilet replacement, faucet leaks, shutoff valves, kitchens, drain repairs...[/trx_block][trx_button style="dark" size="medium" icon="none" link="?page_id=2148" animation="none" top="15" bottom="25" left="0" right="0"]get quote![/trx_button][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_icon icon="icon-gas" color="#d3dbde" size="52"][trx_title link="#" type="4" color="#00abd3" top="18"]Inspections[/trx_title][trx_block]Camera inspection, leaks detection, slow drains, maintenance plans, complete plumbing checkup, plumbing diagnosis, installations...[/trx_block][trx_button style="dark" size="medium" icon="none" link="?page_id=2148" animation="none" top="15" bottom="25" left="0" right="0"]get quote![/trx_button][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_content][/trx_section][trx_line color="#f2f2f2" height="8" animation="fadeInUp"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][trx_content top="90" bottom="87"][trx_columns animation="none"][trx_column_item][trx_highlight type="0" color="#282828" size="30" style="font-weight:600;"]Why Choose Us[/trx_highlight][trx_section animation="none" top="45" bottom="20"][trx_image url="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/why-choose1.jpg" align="left" shape="square" width="250px" height="169px" bottom="20"][trx_highlight type="0" color="#3c454c" size="16" style="font-weight:600;"]Anything you might need from our plumbing specialists[/trx_highlight][vc_column_text]We offer plumbing services and solutions for every type of issue - from common clogs to a full mainline replacement.[/vc_column_text][/trx_section][trx_section animation="none" top="20" bottom="50"][trx_image url="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/why-choose2.jpg" align="left" shape="square" width="250px" height="169px" bottom="20"][trx_highlight type="0" color="#3c454c" size="16" style="font-weight:600;"]Residential and Commercial Plumbing Services[/trx_highlight][trx_block]Professional plumbing services are combined with reasonable prices.[/trx_block][trx_button type="round" style="dark" size="medium" icon="none" animation="none" top="10" bottom="25px" left="0" right="0"]read more[/trx_button][/trx_section][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_highlight type="0" color="#282828" size="30" style="font-weight:600;"]What Our Clients Say[/trx_highlight][trx_section animation="none" top="45"][trx_testimonials controls="off"][trx_testimonials_item name="Maria Anderson," position="Customer" photo="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/testi_m.jpg"]I am their loyal customers and have recommended their services to my friends because of the prompt and courteous service that their plumbing team provides and the high quality of workmanship I can expect every time. Not once the company failed to meet my expectations.[/trx_testimonials_item][trx_testimonials_item name="William Cox" position="Customer" photo="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/01.jpg"]Your service department did a great job at my home cleaning out the sewage line. The service tech had a great attitude, and was very patient as he looked for my cleanouts which were covered by landscaping. Due to your work we got things back to normal within the evening.[/trx_testimonials_item][/trx_testimonials][/trx_section][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][trx_section bg_color="#f5f5f5" animation="none"][trx_content animation="fadeInUp" top="87" bottom="80"][trx_title type="2" align="center"]Our Work[/trx_title][ess_grid alias="projects"][/trx_content][/trx_section][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Help Center
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no"] [trx_content top="60" bottom="40"]

Support Policy

[trx_line style="solid" color="#e8e9e9" width="104" height="1" bottom="65"] [trx_content] [/trx_block] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" bottom="60"] [trx_content] [trx_columns count="2"] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_list style="iconed" icon="icon-record"] [trx_list_item]To get a pre-purchase advice, you may post in the theme’s forum[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]To get a response more promptly, you are recommended to use our Ticket-system[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]We try to answer your questions within 1-10 hours. However, if any delay occurs it doesn’t mean that we forgot about you. Some of the issues require testing and analyzing, so we could help you more profoundly.[/trx_list_item] [/trx_list] [/trx_column_item] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_list style="iconed" icon="icon-record"] [trx_list_item]Please, note! We do not support queries if you do not have a purchase code.[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Item support does not include:
  • Customization and installation services
  • Support for third party software and plug-ins
[/trx_list_item] [/trx_list] [/trx_column_item] [/trx_columns] [/trx_content] [/trx_block] [trx_section bg_image="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/form-bg.png" dedicated="no" scroll="no"] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" columns="3_5" scroll="no" top="95"]

How to use our Support System

[trx_line style="solid" color="#e8e9e9" width="104" height="1"] ThemeRex technical support is always there to assist their users with all their technical questions regarding ThemeRex products. [/trx_block] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" top="50" bottom="55"] [trx_content] [trx_columns count="2"] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_image url="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/macbook-support.png" align="left" shape="square"] [/trx_column_item] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_list style="ol"] [trx_list_item]In the ‘Item Details’ there is a clickable banner “Support Sys”using which you are getting into tickets.[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Or you may simply use this link themerex.ticksy.com[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Enter your purchase key and register in the system[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]To avoid confusing, please use for Support System your ownThemeForest login[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Fill out the ticket form[/trx_list_item] [/trx_list] [/trx_column_item] [/trx_columns] [/trx_content] [/trx_block] [/trx_section] [trx_section dedicated="no" scroll="no"] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" top="95"]

How to find a purchase key

[trx_line style="solid" color="#e8e9e9" width="104" height="1"] [/trx_block] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" bottom="40"] [trx_content] [trx_columns count="2"] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_image url="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/iPad-Air-2.png" align="left" shape="square"] [/trx_column_item] [trx_column_item align="left"] [trx_list style="ol" top="40" ] [trx_list_item]Open the ‘downloads’ tab in your account[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Find our theme in the list of products[/trx_list_item] [trx_list_item]Click ‘download’ button, and in the drop down menu select “license sertificate & purchase code”[/trx_list_item] [/trx_list] [/trx_column_item] [/trx_columns] [trx_columns count="3"] [trx_column_item span="1" align="center"] [trx_icon icon="icon-pencil" color="#1bbde8" size="32" weight="700" align="center"] [trx_button type="round" style="global" size="huge" fullsize="yes" link="#" popup="no" top="30" bottom="40"]create ticket[/trx_button] [/trx_column_item] [trx_column_item span="1" align="center"] [trx_icon icon="icon-speechbubble" color="#1bbde8" size="32" weight="700" align="center"] [trx_button type="round" style="global" size="huge" fullsize="yes" link="#" popup="no" top="30" bottom="40"]discussion[/trx_button] [/trx_column_item] [trx_column_item span="1" align="center"] [trx_icon icon="icon-sheet" color="#1bbde8" size="32" weight="700" align="center"] [trx_button type="round" style="global" size="huge" fullsize="yes" link="http://plumbing.themerex.net/doc" popup="no" top="30" bottom="40"]doc[/trx_button] [/trx_column_item] [/trx_columns] [/trx_content] [/trx_block] [/trx_section] [trx_section bg_color="#f4f4f4" dedicated="no" scroll="no"] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" top="95"] [trx_content]

Support Team

[trx_line style="solid" color="#e8e9e9" width="104" height="1"] We create our themes with a thought of our customers, thereforeour team works hard to provide you best technical support in the world. [/trx_content] [/trx_block] [trx_content] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no" top="50" bottom="10" columns="4_5"] [trx_team count="3"] [trx_team_item name="Irvin" photo="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Irvin.jpg"][/trx_team_item] [trx_team_item name="Andy" photo="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Andy.jpg"][/trx_team_item] [trx_team_item name="Katerine" photo="http://plumbing.themerex.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Katerine.jpg"][/trx_team_item] [/trx_team] [/trx_block] [/trx_content] [/trx_section] [trx_section bg_color="#5c6e8b" dedicated="no" scroll="no"] [trx_content top="40" bottom="25"] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no"] [trx_highlight type="0" color="#ffffff" size="14" style="text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1.75px; font-weight: 700;"]If you have complaints about the work of our support staff, please inform us about your issue via email[/trx_highlight] [/trx_block] [trx_block dedicated="no" align="center" scroll="no"] [trx_button type="transparent" style="light" size="big" link="?page_id=2148" fullsize="no" top="20"]contact us[/trx_button] [/trx_block] [/trx_content] [/trx_section]

item.title: Support
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449052136583{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][trx_section][trx_title type="2" align="center"]Our Support Policy[/trx_title][trx_columns margins=""][trx_column_item][vc_column_text]
  • To get a pre-purchase advice, you may post in the theme’s forum.
  • To get a response more promptly, you are recommended to use our Ticket-system.
  • We try to answer your questions within 1-10 hours. However, if any delay occurs, it doesn’t mean that we forgot about you. Some of the issues require testing and analyzing, so we can resolve it effectively.
[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][vc_column_text]
  • Please note! We do not provide support, if you do not have the purchase code.
  • Item support does not include:
    1. Customization and installation.
    2. Support for third party software and plugins.
[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_section][trx_line color="#dddddd"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" scheme="light"][vc_column][trx_section][trx_title type="2" align="center" color="#000000" bottom="tiny"]How to use our Support System[/trx_title][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449064514175{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

ThemeRex technical support is always there to assist their users with all the technical questions regarding ThemeRex products.

[/vc_column_text][trx_columns top="tiny" margins=""][trx_column_item][trx_image url="5900"][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449069392501{margin-top: 20px !important;}"]
  1. In the ‘Item Details’ there is a clickable banner “Support Sys”, which leads you to tickets.
  2. Or you may simply follow this link: themerex.ticksy.com.
  3. Enter your purchase key and register in the system.
  4. To avoid a confusion, please use your own ThemeForest login in Support System.
  5. Fill out the ticket form.
[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_section][trx_line color="#dddddd"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1449069687256{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][trx_section][trx_title type="2" align="center"]How to find a purchase key[/trx_title][trx_columns margins=""][trx_column_item][trx_image url="5901" top="tiny"][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][vc_column_text]
  • Open the "downloads" tab in your account.
  • Find our theme in the list of products.
  • Click "download" button, and in the drop-down menu select "license certificate & purchase code".
[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_section][trx_line color="#dddddd"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" scheme="light"][vc_column][trx_section][trx_title type="2" align="center"]Hosting[/trx_title][trx_title type="4" align="center"]Recommended hostings:[/trx_title][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449071203295{margin-top: 30px !important;}"]

ThemeREX offers only the best products and services and recommends them to their customers. One of the most important services is HOSTING. Unlike any cheap hostings that usually have limited resources which causes many problems to the site owners, quality hosting gives a client a fair amount of resources sufficient for any website and any task. By using quality hosting you can rest assured that your site will work smoothly. If you happen to use such hosting with limited resources (e.g. GoDaddy!), you may experience issues with “one-click install” feature. In that case, you are always welcome to contact our support team to get qualified help.

[/vc_column_text][trx_columns margins=""][trx_column_item align="center"][trx_image url="5902" link="https://secure1.inmotionhosting.com/cgi-bin/gby/clickthru.cgi?id=themerex"][vc_column_text]

http://www.inmotionhosting.com

Get more than 30% discount on a hosting plan.

[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item align="center"][trx_image url="5903" link="https://mediatemple.net/"][vc_column_text]

http://mediatemple.net

[/vc_column_text][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_section][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Sole proprietorship: A sole proprietorship is owned by one person and operates for their benefit. The owner may operate the business alone or with other people. A sole proprietor has unlimited liability for all obligations incurred by the business, whether from operating costs or judgements against the business. All assets of the business belong to a sole proprietor, including, for example, computer infrastructure, any inventory, manufacturing equipment and/or retail fixtures, as well as any real property owned by the business.

item.title: Drainage and Runoff

Many businesses are operated through a separate entity such as a corporation or a partnership (either formed with or without limited liability). Most legal jurisdictions allow people to organize such an entity by filing certain charter documents with the relevant Secretary of State or equivalent and complying with certain other ongoing obligations. The relationships and legal rights of shareholders, limited partners, or members are governed partly by the charter documents and partly by the law of the jurisdiction where the entity is organized. Generally speaking, shareholders in a corporation, limited partners in a limited partnership, and members in a limited liability company are shielded from personal liability for the debts and obligations of the entity, which is legally treated as a separate "person". This means that unless there is misconduct, the owner's own possessions are strongly protected in law if the business does not succeed.
